thread.section_title: Motorama Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Motorama | motorama.com.au | 2 of 47
thread.title: Gemma

author: Gemma
title: Gemma
text:
We recently bought a new car through Motorama City Holden and were very pleased with the process and outcome.
From our initial enquiry through to test drives and the purchase transaction, Jason Price and the Motorama team were friendly, prompt and professional and worked to ensure that we were comfortable the whole way through.
We've been thrilled with the level of service and attention to detail throughout the entire purchase process (so much so that we'll be moving all future servicing of our other Holden across to the centre as well, and are looking forward to purchasing with them when the time comes!).
